@/@item/@window/@items/@_xworker_thingEditorWindow_tree_/@listeners/@click/@setCurrentItem
sname
setCurrentItem
Scode
#$@text#$@
//设置当前选中的树节点
var tree = Ext.getCmp('xworker_thingTreeWindow_tree');
tree.currentThingPath = node.attributes.id;
var thingPath = node.attributes.id;

//显示编辑器
var iframe = document.getElementById('xworker_thingTreeWindow_editorFrame');
var random = 'random=' + (new Date()).getTime();
iframe.src = 'do?' + random + '&sc=xworker.app.view.extjs.xworker.thingEditor.XWorker_ThingEditor&thingPath=' + node.attributes.id;
#$@text#$@
sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.Function/@Code

sth_registMyChilds

sth_mark

Scode
#$@text#$@
var parentFn = Ext.getCmp('xworker_thingTreeWindow').parentFn;
if(parentFn){
    parentFn('${thing.getMetadata().getPath()}');
}

 Ext.getCmp('xworker_thingTreeWindow').close();
#$@text#$@
